response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, it is valued at $10,000 by you, which aligns perfectly with its true worth. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $9,500. This special offer allows you to secure this remarkable product at a competitive price, ensuring both value and satisfaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
